description:
Marasco & Nesselbush, LLP: We Strive For Nothing Short Of Extraordinary Results For Each Client

When faced with the physical, financial and emotional challenges of a severe accident injury to yourself or a loved one, the attorneys of Marasco & Nesselbush, LLP, will be there to help you secure full and fair compensation.

Since 1999, our firm's founding attorneys, Joseph P. Marasco and Donna M. Nesselbush have dedicated their practice to providing clients in Rhode Island, Massachusetts and Connecticut with the dedicated personal injury, medical malpractice and Social Security Disability representation they need to recover comfortably. Blending years of legal experience and a network of professional resources, our team at Marasco & Nesselbush, LLP, is well-equipped to handle the most complex personal injury cases involving:

  • Car, truck and other motor vehicle accidents
  • Catastrophic injuries
  • Medical malpractice
  • Product liability
  • Slip and fall as well as other premises liability
  • Social Security Disability
  • Wrongful death

Whether you or a loved one has been injured in a motor vehicle accident or due to the negligence of a health care provider, you can rely on the hard work, intelligence, integrity and attention to detail the lawyers and staff at Marasco & Nesselbush, LLP, will provide.

Reach out to our Providence, Rhode Island, law firm or one of our other locations to schedule a consultation.
